alert.note: Alert for Clark; Pike (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 11 at 5:42PM CDT until July 13 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Arkansas and southwest Arkansas, including the following counties, in southeast Arkansas, Bradley, Cleveland and Drew. In southwest Arkansas, Calhoun, Clark, Dallas, Ouachita and Pike. * WHEN...From Midnight CDT tonight through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
